DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine 6-month survival overall survival patient unresectable metastatic biliary tract carcinoma gallbladder cancer treat gemcitabine , fluorouracil , leucovorin calcium . II . Determine tumor response patient treat regimen . III . Determine toxicity regimen patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute follow leucovorin calcium IV fluorouracil IV 5-10 minute day 1 , 8 , 15 . Treatment repeat every 4 week minimum 2 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 1 year every 6 month 4 year .
